items.sentence: I\'d prefer it if you didn\'t tell Tom about this.
If Tom doesn\'t want to help, he doesn\'t have to.
I\'ve always known that this would happen someday.
I\'ve arranged for Tom to meet you at the airport.
I\'ve been able to read since I was six years old.
I\'ve been trying to get Tom to take his medicine.
I\'ve been trying to talk to you for over a month.
Tom said he was tired and wanted to go home early.
Tom said that he wanted to impress his girlfriend.
Tom said that he would never steal anything again.
Can you suggest something that may be more useful?
Can you tell me how to get to the nearest station?
Can you tell me where the nearest antique shop is?
Can you think of anyone who might be able to help?
Tom and Mary never took their eyes off each other.
Tom asked Mary if she wanted him to walk her home.
I don\'t remember ever seeing one of these before.
When Tom was young, he would often watch baseball.
When was the last time you had your eyes examined?
It\'s been a long time since I\'ve been to Boston.
